```{r  echo=F , results='asis' }
## Create a table of images
thb_dir <- "/media/julien/Backup_Total_12T/Backup_Deep_Mapping/test_zenodo_drone_UAV_flights/20220913_MYT-ngouja_UAV-02_3/METADATA/thumbnails"
image_files <- list.files(thb_dir, "JPG", full.names = T)
image_tab <- dplyr::tibble(Path = image_files, FileName =gsub("_PreviewImage.JPG",".JPG",gsub(paste0(thb_dir,"/"),"",image_files)))
this_df <- image_tab
nb_img=length(this_df$FileName)
img_per_line=8
nrows <-  round(nb_img/img_per_line)
last_row = 0
if((nb_img-(nrows*img_per_line))>0){
  last_row = 1 
}
df_thb <-NULL
# df_thb <- dplyr::tibble(matrix(NA, nrow = nrows + last_row, ncol = 2*img_per_line))
df_thb <- data.frame(matrix(NA, nrow = nrows + last_row, ncol = 2*img_per_line))
for(i in 1:img_per_line) {     
  # new_col <- image_tab$FileName[seq(i,nb_img,img_per_line)]
  new_col <- this_df$Path[seq(i,(nrows + last_row)*img_per_line,img_per_line)]
  # cat(seq(i,nb_img+i,img_per_line))
  # cat("\n")
  # cat(new_col)
  # cat("\n")
  # cat(length(new_col))
  # cat("\n")
  # df_thb[, ncol(df_thb) + 1] <- new_col
  df_thb[, (2*i-1)] <- new_col
  df_thb[, (2*i)] <- gsub("_PreviewImage.JPG",".JPG",gsub(".*thumbnails/","",new_col)) 
  # new <- rep(i, nrow(df_thb))                       # Create new column
  # data[ , ncol(data) + 1] <- new                  # Append new column
  colnames(df_thb)[(2*i-1)] <- paste0("path", i)  # Rename column name
  colnames(df_thb)[(2*i)] <- paste0("label", i)  # Rename column name
}
# df_thb
# colnames(df_thb)
```

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE,  out.width='100%', results='asis' }
# options(width = 3000)

gt_df_thb <- NULL
gt_df_thb <- df_thb |>  gt() 
# https://forum.posit.co/t/how-to-assign-a-column-name-as-a-variable/91209
for(i in 1:img_per_line) {   
  col <- rlang::sym(colnames(df_thb)[(2*i-1)])
  label_col <- rlang::sym(colnames(df_thb)[2*i])
  # cat(col)
  # cat("\n")
  gt_df_thb <- gt_df_thb |> tab_style(style = cell_text(size = "large", align = "center", color = "black", weight = "bold"),locations = cells_body(columns = label_col)) |> 
    gtExtras::gt_img_rows(columns= {{col}}, img_source = "local", height  = 150)  |>   gt_merge_stack(col1 = col, col2 = label_col)  |>
  tab_style(style =  list(cell_fill(color = "lightcyan"), cell_text(size = "large", align = "center", color = "black", weight = "bolder", style = "italic",decorate = "underline")),locations = cells_body(columns = col) ) |>
    tab_style(
      style = cell_borders(
        # sides = c("t", "l"),
        color = "black",
        weight = px(3)
      ),
      locations = cells_body()
    ) 
  # gt_df_thb <- gt_df_thb  |> gtExtras::gt_img_rows(columns= {{col}}, img_source = "local", height = 30) 
}
```
